tooltip.vrm:death1: Attack have a chance to life steal
tooltip.vrm:death2: [Right-Click] Mark surrounding targets, dealing more damage
tooltip.vrm:death3: [Shift Right-Click] Apply voodoo(all damage will be transferred to target) onto target
tooltip.vrm:death4: [Have a chance of revival on death & dealing target's half max hp damage]
tooltip.vrm:war1: Attack have a chance to ignite target
tooltip.vrm:war3: [Shift Right-Click] Inflict rage and cause near-by mobs to fight each other
tooltip.vrm:war4: [Gain resistance and strength on low health]
tooltip.vrm:pes1: Shoot Magical Arrow which causes Plague (will release toxin when target dies)
tooltip.vrm:pes3: [Crouching Shoot] Shoots 3 Magical Arrows but with poor accuracy
tooltip.vrm:fam1: Absorbs nearby life force to fill hunger
